body:
This includes:

- any questions or feedback you leave
- your email address (if you leave feedback)
- your IP address, and details of which version of web browser you used
- information on how you interact with the guide

This helps us to:

- improve the guide by monitoring how you use it
- respond to any feedback or questions you send us, if you’ve asked us to

We can’t identify you using your data.

### Where your data is stored

Any information you provide is held by [SurveyMonkey](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/). Check the [SurveyMonkey privacy policy](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/mp/policy/privacy-policy/) to find out what it does with your information.

### Links to other websites

This privacy policy only applies to this guide. It doesn’t cover the services and websites that we link to.

### Following a link to another website

If you go to another website from this guide, read the privacy policy on that website to find out what it does with your information.

### Following a link to this guide from another website

If you come to this guide from another website, we may receive personal information about you from the other website. Read the privacy policy of that website to find out more.
